amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: University of Nebraska; health programs; sole responsibility; exception.
amendatorysection.para: The University of Nebraska shall have sole responsibility for baccalaureate, first professional, master's, and doctoral programs in the health professions to include medicine, dentistry, pharmacy, nursing, and the allied health professions, with the exception of the baccalaureate programs in the allied health professions established at the state colleges prior to June 1, 1977.
